LanguageData.RK_HandTailoringBench.label: hand tailor bench
LanguageData.RK_HandTailoringBench.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.RK_HandTailoringBench_Blueprint.label: hand tailor bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.RK_HandTailoringBench_Frame.label: hand tailor bench (building)
LanguageData.RK_HandTailoringBench_Frame.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.RK_ElectricTailoringBench.label: electric tailor bench
LanguageData.RK_ElectricTailoringBench.description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 50% of normal speed.
LanguageData.RK_ElectricTailoringBench_Frame.label: electric tailor bench (building)
LanguageData.RK_ElectricTailoringBench_Frame.descript: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 50% of normal speed.
LanguageData.RK_FueledSmithy.label: fueled smithy
LanguageData.RK_FueledSmithy.description: A wood-fueled station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.RK_FueledSmithy_Blueprint.label: fueled smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.RK_FueledSmithy_Blueprint_Install.label: fueled smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.RK_FueledSmithy_Frame.label: fueled smithy (building)
LanguageData.RK_FueledSmithy_Frame.description: A wood-fueled station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.RK_ElectricSmithy.label: electric smithy
LanguageData.RK_ElectricSmithy.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.RK_ElectricSmithy_Blueprint.label: electric smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.RK_ElectricSmithy_Frame.label: electric smithy (building)
LanguageData.RK_ElectricSmithy_Frame.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
